title: Godfather - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance
author: 龙行大家
description:
Five years ago, I went to jail for the sake of my best brother.

Five years later, I came out of prison only to find that all of it was a trap set by him and my girlfriend.

The two I loved most, actually did this to me!

Vengeance!

For what both of you have taken from me, I will take every single one of them back; and I will strip you bare!>
